ComicInfo.Title: A Monster at My Window!; A Monster Among Us; The Spy; The Joker!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 19:43:22. [CVDB179284] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:48:14. [Issue ID 96183]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Kirby,Joe Sinnott,Bill Walton,Steve Ditko,Jack Kirby,Joe Sinnott,Bill Walton,Steve Ditko
ComicInfo.Inker: Dick Ayers,Joe Sinnott,Bill Walton,Steve Ditko,Dick Ayers,Joe Sinnott,Bill Walton,Steve Ditko
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Monster at My Window!: An alien from another dimension threatens a science fiction writer, but the writer is secretly a hostile alien from a different dimension.
A Monster Among Us: A man encounters a lighthouse keeper who is a monster in disguise.
The Spy: An alien from a methane world learns the habits of earthmen to spy upon them for an upcoming invasion. When he returns to his world to give his report, he automatically strikes a match to light a cigarette while waiting.
The Joker!: A practical joker thinks that aliens are his victims playing a joke on him, but they are real aliens and take him to an offworld zoo.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
